attributes.action: Ban all firework sales except the days of November 5th And December 31st
attributes.additional_details: To stop inconsiderate people letting off fireworks randomly in the build up to bonfire night and the build up to NYE. This will help prevent the anxieties of elderly people, people with aural sensitivities e.g. people on the autistic spectrum, children in bed and animals.
attributes.background: To ban sales of fireworks to the general public on all days of the year apart from November 5th and December 31st.
